extensionDescription.message: Identity Chooser helps you to choose the correct identity when composing a new email, replying to one or forwarding it.

options_icEnableComposeMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Write button

options_icEnableReplayMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Reply button

options_icEnableForwardMessage.label.message: Show List of Identities When Clicking on Forward button

options_restart.hint.message: Hint: If you change any of these options you need to restart Thunderbird

options_sortOrder.hint.message: Resort the identities here using drag and drop. You can hide an identity from the compose/reply/forward buttons by unchecking it:

options_icWarnColorsHint.message:
Earlier versions of Identity Chooser offered the possibility to color the background of the email editor differently for different senders when composing.

This functionality is no longer available until further notice.

Instead, I recommend the addon Border Colors D[1], which provides a similar functionality.

[1] https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/bordercolors-d/
